text: Luca Ceccarelli may refer to: *Luca Ceccarelli (footballer, born 20 March 1983), Italian football fullback, currently plays for Arezzo *Luca Ceccarelli (footballer, born 24 March 1983), Italian football winger or fullback, currently plays for San Marino Calcio *Luca Ceccarelli (filmmaker) (born in 1974) Filmmaker, born in Nottingham ==See also== *Luca Ceccaroli (born 1995), Sanmarinese footballer
title: Luca Ceccarelli
